```{python}
import geopandas as gpd
import pyarrow as pa
import pyarrow.parquet as pq

gdf = gpd.read_file("./data/osm_buildings.gpkg")

```

```{python}
gdf = gdf.drop(columns=['code','fclass','osm_id','name','type'])

output_path = "data/osm_buildings.parquet"

gdf.to_parquet(
    output_path,
    engine="pyarrow",
    compression="snappy"   # fast + good compression
)
```
